headline: Lennox Recognized on Wall Street Journal's 2024 List of Best-Managed Companies
summary: Lennox (NYSE: LII), a leading provider of innovative climate control solutions, was selected for the Wall Street Journal's prestigious list of 2024 Best-Managed Companies for the second consecutive year. The Drucker Institute developed the Management Top 250 ranking and measures corporate management by examining customer satisfaction, employee engagement and development, innovation, social responsibility, and financial strength metrics.

headline: Lennox To Join S&P 500 Index, Replacing Catalent
summary: Lennox International, an AI cooling play, will join the S&P 500 before the open on Dec. 23. Bill Holdings will take its place in the S&P Midcap 400.
